replies.bodyText: @SHuang-Broad What's your opinion?  It doesn't seem like any of the existing values of SamPairUtil.PairOrientation make sense.  If it weren't in htsjdk I would be tempted to add DIFFERENT_CHROMOSOMES to the enum.  I could imagine throwing an error and leaving it to the calling code to check.  I could also imagine having this method return an Optional<SamPairUtil.PairOrientation> and reserving an empty result for this case.
